ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Chant of Battle problems
ygData.msgSnippet: That was my problem as well.  A good enchanter makes many of our tactics unusable.  I finally stuck on using hymn, warsong, and CoB after making it clear the
ygData.messageBody:
That was my problem as well. A good enchanter makes many of our tactics
unusable. I finally stuck on using hymn, warsong, and CoB after making it
clear the enchanter should not buff people with Strengthen. When our ranger
wasn't there I used Chains in place of CoB.

As for stacking, if CoB was up Strengthen would stick and CoB would still
work, but CoB would not stick after Strengthen. Also, The Screaming Mace
effect will not stick if you are singing CoB, but if Screaming Mace effect
goes off first, CoB will stack on top of it. Weird huh?

Kit

-----Original Message-----
From: Papa Legba [mailto:legba@...]
Sent: Wednesday, May 03, 2000 9:43 AM
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Chant of Battle problems


Hmmm... This could be it, still sounds like a bug to me since it isn't
consistent. It isn't a big deal I guess, but just leaves me with no low
level buffs that i can use when we have a good enchanter (IE one who
would rather haste the bashers then try to be 4th rate wizard)

"Kimes, Dean W." wrote:
>
> If the enchanter cast Strengthen on people this would cause it. I found
> that CoB doesn't seem to stack with Strengthen consistently. I seem to
> remember a problem with CoB stacking with Dextrous Aura as well but its
been
> a while so I'm not certain of that one. It doesn't stack with Anthem
either
> but I think that info is in the Song Analysis.
--
We now return to the non-stop rock.

Matt DeBarger
